name: Tune Stay
description: This project allows users to search for songs using different database engines, view their lyrics, and get apartment listings based on song sections.

name: Semantify
description: This project allows users to search for songs based on a prompt, share their results, interact socially through a feed, follow other users, and like posts.

name: Tendindo
description: An Android application for managing collaborative projects, allowing users to create projects, assign tasks, manage collaborators, schedule meetings, and communicate through an integrated forum.

name: Conversational Agent - QWERTY
description: Conversational agent capable of analyzing and answering questions from documents notes using Retrieval-Augmented Generation, embeddings, and web search tools.

name: Audio Spectrogram Classifier
description: Investigative project focused on learning and applying convolutional neural networks for environmental sound classification.

name: HTTP/1.0 Server
description: This project implements an HTTP/1.0 server built from scratch (raw TCP sockets, no frameworks), designed to handle concurrent tasks through a global Worker Pool with per-command concurrency limits.

name: JOCOTE Transpiler
description: An educational programming language designed to be simple and easy to understand. Features a transpiler that converts JOCOTE code into Python.

name: Flag Game
description: Flag Game is a game where you must select the correct country from four options based on the displayed flag. It features three different game modes: by rounds, timed, and survival.

name: Simplified IMDb
description: An interactive website that allows users to manage information about movies, actors, and casts.

name: Battle City
description: A Java version of the original NES game 'Battle City'. It features a level editor, scoring, and statistics.

name: MyPetsCr
description: Centralizes the management of patients, medical records, appointments, and the buying and selling of products.

name: Cerro Dragón Tours
description: Built for a local business offering tours in the Cerro Los Naranjos area of Aserrí, Costa Rica. The site features responsive design, tour filtering, and optimized images.

name: Sales Dashboard
description: This project displays a list of sales representatives from a JSON file. Clicking on a representative opens a dashboard with their specific details.
